titleStmt.title: Elisha his lamentation, upon the suddain translation of Elijah. Opened in a sermon at the funeral of Mr. VVilliam Strong, that eminently faithful servant and minister of Christ. By Obadiah Sedgwick, B.D. and preacher of the Gospel in Covent Garden.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, Obadiah, 1600?-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton, at the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street, near the Inner-Temple Gate.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
